entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@IvankaTrump Is your dad saying covid-19 just walked into our lives uninvited and will leave us alone when bored?
“This is going to go away without a vaccine, it’s gonna go away, and we’re not going to see it again, hopefully, after a period of time,” Trump said at the White House. 9.5.2020
